titleStmt.title: A proclamation anent recruits, levies, deserters and passes
Proclamations. 1696-02-13
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
William III, King of England, 1650-1702.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by the heirs and successors of Andrew Anderson, printer to the Kings most excellent Majest[ies],

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Edinburgh, the thirteenth day of February, and of Our Reign the seventh year, 1696.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library, Washington, D.C..
